### 🎈・Code example

Example of how you can use [bitches](https://pypi.org/project/bitches/)

```py
import bitches #valid

bitches.get()

or

bitches.get(
  "yes", # directory name (default: "bitches")
  5 # amount of bitches (default: randint(5, 10))
)
```
